column6: "Recruited" by Nick Fury to journey into space to destroy a sentient HYDRA space weapon, The Hulk has now learned the sordid truth behind its agenda-not that it matters now, though...because the rogue space weapon now has its sights set on him!
column8: | penciller:Juan Santa Cruz | letterer:Randy Gentile | colorist:Jason Keith | penciller (cover):Brandon Peterson | writer:Daniel Way
